name: card6-voice-platform
description: Google Live API voice conversation platform

scripts.build: pnpm --filter shared build && pnpm --filter backend build && pnpm --filter frontend build
scripts.test: pnpm --filter backend test && pnpm --filter frontend test
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter backend lint && pnpm --filter frontend lint
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm --filter backend lint:fix && pnpm --filter frontend lint:fix
scripts.typecheck: pnpm --filter shared typecheck && pnpm --filter backend typecheck && pnpm --filter frontend typecheck
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter backend clean && pnpm --filter frontend clean
